header.title: cosEventDomainApp

erlref.modulesummary: The main module of the cosEventDomain application.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosEventDomain/include/*.hrl").
This module contains the functions for starting and stopping the application.

desc.p: This operation installs the cosEventDomain application.
This operation uninstalls the cosEventDomain application.
This operation starts the cosEventDomain application.
This operation stops the cosEventDomain application.

func.name: start_factory() -> Factory
func.fsummary: Start a factory with default settings

desc.p: This operation creates a new instance of a Event Domain Factory using the default settings.

func.name: start_factory(Options) -> Factory
func.fsummary: Start a factory with settings defined by the given options

desc.p: This operation creates a new instance of a Event Domain Factory

func.name: start_factory_link() -> Factory
func.fsummary: Start a factory, which is linked to the invoking process, with default settings

desc.p: This operation creates a new instance of a Event Domain Factory, which is linked to the invoking process, using the default settings.

func.name: start_factory_link(Options) -> Factory
func.fsummary: Start a factory, which is linked to the invoking process, with settings defined by the given options

desc.p: This operation creates a new instance of a Event Domain Factory, which is linked to the invoking process, with settings defined by the given options. Allowed options are the same as for cosEventDomainApp:start_factory/1.
This operation stop the target factory.
